Mom_D1: Good morning sweetheart. Did you sleep well?
Mom_D2: Before you go to school, there is a sandwich I made you in the kitchen.
Mom_D3: Is something wrong sweetheart? You need to prepare to go to school.
Mom_D4: Strange noises in my bedroom? You must still be sleepy.
Stranger_D1: Hey boy! Help me out! I'm tied to your mother's bed and I can't free myself.
Stranger_D2: I need some scissors and my phone. I don't know where it is.
Stranger_D3: I found your house key, it will be yours if you help me. Deal?
Stranger_D4: Please, you still need to find my phone and scissors.
Stranger_D5: Perfect, find my phone and the key is yours.
Stranger_D6: Perfect, find some scissors and the key is yours.
Stranger_D7: Thank you so much! Here, let me give you the key of your house.
I'll go through the window so your mother doesn't see me. Thanks again for your help!
